Title: Increases the requisite vote required by a local government to adopt a budget that includes a tax levy
Summary: Increases the requisite vote required by a local government to adopt a budget that includes a tax levy.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to increasing the requisite vote required by a local government to adopt a budget that includes a tax levy
